rows.business_item_short_description: A cloud service supporting modern business and developers.
rows.business_item_long_description: Azure is a cloud service included in the Intelligent Cloud segment that supports modern business and developers by providing cloud infrastructure and AI offerings. It is part of the server products and cloud services offered by Microsoft.
rows.evidence_span: It primarily consists of server products and cloud services such as Azure, GitHub, and Nuance Healthcare cloud services

rows.business_item_short_description: A cloud service supporting modern business and developers.
rows.business_item_long_description: GitHub is a cloud service included in the Intelligent Cloud segment that supports modern business and developers by providing cloud infrastructure and AI offerings. It is part of the server products and cloud services offered by Microsoft.
rows.evidence_span: It primarily consists of server products and cloud services such as Azure, GitHub, and Nuance Healthcare cloud services

rows.business_item_long_description: Nuance Healthcare cloud services are part of the Intelligent Cloud segment, providing cloud-based solutions specifically for the healthcare industry. These services support modern business and developers with cloud infrastructure and AI offerings.
rows.evidence_span: It primarily consists of server products and cloud services such as Azure, GitHub, and Nuance Healthcare cloud services

rows.business_item_short_description: Enterprise and partner services supporting IT professionals.
rows.business_item_long_description: Enterprise Support Services are part of the Intelligent Cloud segment, offering professional services to enhance productivity and efficiency for IT professionals and developers. These services are included in the enterprise and partner services category.
rows.evidence_span: as well as enterprise and partner services including Enterprise Support Services and Microsoft Partner Network

rows.business_item_short_description: A network of enterprise and partner services.
rows.business_item_long_description: Microsoft Partner Network is part of the Intelligent Cloud segment, providing enterprise and partner services that support IT professionals and developers. It is included alongside Enterprise Support Services in the segment's offerings.
rows.evidence_span: as well as enterprise and partner services including Enterprise Support Services and Microsoft Partner Network

rows.business_item_short_description: Licensing of Windows operating system to original equipment manufacturers.
rows.business_item_long_description: Windows OEM licensing involves providing Windows operating system licenses to original equipment manufacturers for pre-installation on new devices. This enables personalized technology experiences through Windows-based devices.
rows.evidence_span: It includes Windows and Devices such as Windows OEM licensing and Surface devices

rows.business_item_short_description: Microsoft's line of personal computing devices.
rows.business_item_long_description: Surface devices are a range of personal computing hardware products designed to deliver personalized technology experiences. They are part of the Windows and Devices category within the More Personal Computing segment.
rows.evidence_span: It includes Windows and Devices such as Windows OEM licensing and Surface devices

rows.business_item_short_description: Gaming consoles and related hardware products.
rows.business_item_long_description: Xbox hardware refers to Microsoft's gaming consoles and associated devices that support gaming experiences. This includes the physical consoles used to access Xbox content and services.
rows.evidence_span: Gaming with Xbox hardware and content including Xbox Game Pass and Xbox Cloud Gaming

rows.business_item_long_description: Xbox Game Pass is a subscription service that provides access to a wide library of Xbox games. It is part of the gaming content and services offered within the More Personal Computing segment.
rows.evidence_span: Gaming with Xbox hardware and content including Xbox Game Pass and Xbox Cloud Gaming

rows.business_item_short_description: Cloud-based gaming service for Xbox games.
rows.business_item_long_description: Xbox Cloud Gaming allows users to stream Xbox games over the cloud without the need for local hardware. It enhances gaming accessibility and is included in the gaming content and services.
rows.evidence_span: Gaming with Xbox hardware and content including Xbox Game Pass and Xbox Cloud Gaming

rows.business_item_long_description: Bing is Microsoft's search engine that provides search and news advertising services. It is part of the segment's focus on search and news advertising to enhance user engagement.
rows.evidence_span: Search and news advertising through Bing, Microsoft Edge, and Microsoft News

rows.business_item_long_description: Microsoft Edge is a web browser that supports search and news advertising. It is part of the More Personal Computing segment's offerings to enhance user engagement across devices.
rows.evidence_span: Search and news advertising through Bing, Microsoft Edge, and Microsoft News

rows.business_item_long_description: Microsoft News provides news content and advertising services as part of the search and news advertising category. It aims to enhance user engagement through personalized news experiences.
rows.evidence_span: Search and news advertising through Bing, Microsoft Edge, and Microsoft News

rows.business_item: Microsoft 365 Commercial and Consumer products and cloud services
rows.business_item_short_description: A portfolio of productivity, communication, and information services across various devices and platforms.
rows.business_item_long_description: Microsoft 365 Commercial and Consumer products and cloud services provide productivity, communication, and information services designed for various devices and platforms. These services support business productivity and collaboration.
rows.evidence_span: It features Microsoft 365 Commercial and Consumer products and cloud services

rows.business_item: LinkedIn with its Talent, Marketing, Premium, and Sales Solutions
rows.business_item_short_description: Professional networking services including Talent, Marketing, Premium, and Sales Solutions.
rows.business_item_long_description: LinkedIn offers professional networking services that include Talent, Marketing, Premium, and Sales Solutions. These services support professional networking and business growth.
rows.evidence_span: LinkedIn with its Talent, Marketing, Premium, and Sales Solutions

rows.business_item: Dynamics products and cloud services including Dynamics 365 ERP and CRM applications
rows.business_item_short_description: Business applications including ERP and CRM solutions delivered via cloud services.
rows.business_item_long_description: Dynamics products and cloud services include Dynamics 365 ERP and CRM applications that provide intelligent cloud-based business solutions. These tools help businesses manage operations and customer relationships effectively.
rows.evidence_span: Dynamics products and cloud services including Dynamics 365 ERP and CRM applications
